{"DocLinkBaseURL": "https://pkg.golang.dev"}
-- input --
Did you know?

  - [encoding/json.Marshal] is a doc link. So is [encoding/json.Unmarshal].
-- text --
Did you know?

  - encoding/json.Marshal is a doc link. So is encoding/json.Unmarshal.
-- markdown --
Did you know?

  - [encoding/json.Marshal](https://pkg.golang.dev/encoding/json#Marshal) is a doc link. So is [encoding/json.Unmarshal](https://pkg.golang.dev/encoding/json#Unmarshal).
-- html --
<p>Did you know?
<ul>
<li><a href="https://pkg.golang.dev/encoding/json#Marshal">encoding/json.Marshal</a> is a doc link. So is <a href="https://pkg.golang.dev/encoding/json#Unmarshal">encoding/json.Unmarshal</a>.
</ul>
